decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (2015-10-5458/1 Rev 2 and 2015-10-5458/2 Rev 2, dated 10/12/2015, received 10/12/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The expanded lounge as shown on the drawing 2015-10-5458/1 Revision 2, dated 10/12/2015, received 10/12/2015 shall be available for use before the rooms in the loft space are occupied and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.
description: Conversion of existing roof space into habitable rooms incorporating 2 front roof windows and 2 rear roof windows to the first floor flat
